full_summary:

### Rapid Modernization of Correctional Facilities - Request for Proposal

### Solicitation Number

### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Tender Status**: Expired
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods - Correctional equipment

### Scope of Work
-----------------

The Correctional Service of Canada invites Proponents to submit a request for proposal to supply [CHAIR (OFFICE)] for correctional facilities. The contract shall be a non-renewable contract with an expected (start date) and (end date). The delivery of the goods shall take place from (start date) to (end date).
